00022 void AssemblyMediator3D::MoveXY(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00023 {
00024         Vertex to_obj = cam_pos - obj_pos;
00025 
00026         float mouse_dx = to_obj.length()*(m_mouse_x - event.getMouseEvent().GetX())/window_w;
00027         float mouse_dy = to_obj.length()*(m_mouse_y - event.getMouseEvent().GetY())/window_h*0.9;
00028 
00029         Vertex direction(mouse_dx,mouse_dy,0.0);
00030         direction.rotate(0.0,cam_rot_y,0.0);
00031 
00032         float new_x = old_x - direction.getX();
00033         float new_y = old_y + direction.getY();
00034 
00035         doSnapMove(new_x);
00036         doSnapMove(new_y);
00037 
00038         if (new_y <= (m_Assembly->getOverGround()*1.1))
00039         {
00040                 new_y = m_Assembly->getOverGround();
00041         }
00042 
00043         m_Assembly->setX(new_x);
00044         m_Assembly->setY(new_y);
00045 
00046         obj_pos.setX(new_x);
00047         obj_pos.setY(new_y);
00048 }

00055 void AssemblyMediator3D::MoveXZ(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00056 {
00057         Vertex to_obj = cam_pos - obj_pos;
00058 
00059         float mouse_dx = to_obj.length()*(m_mouse_x - event.getMouseEvent().GetX())/window_w*0.99;
00060         float mouse_dy = to_obj.length()*(m_mouse_y - event.getMouseEvent().GetY())/window_h*0.99;
00061 
00062         Vertex direction(mouse_dx,0.0,mouse_dy);
00063         direction.rotate(0.0,cam_rot_y,0.0);
00064 
00065         float new_x = old_x - direction.getX();
00066         float new_z = old_z - direction.getZ();
00067 
00068         doSnapMove(new_x);
00069         doSnapMove(new_z);
00070 
00071         m_Assembly->setX(new_x);
00072         m_Assembly->setZ(new_z);
00073 
00074         obj_pos.setX(new_x);
00075         obj_pos.setZ(new_z);
00076 }

00083 void AssemblyMediator3D::RotateXY(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00084 {
00085         float new_phi   = phi_old + 720.0f*(event.getMouseEvent().GetY() - m_mouse_y)/window_h;
00086         float new_theta = theta_old + 720.0f*(event.getMouseEvent().GetX() - m_mouse_x)/window_w;
00087 
00088         doSnapRotate(new_phi);
00089         doSnapRotate(new_theta);
00090 
00091         m_Assembly->setPhi(new_phi);
00092         m_Assembly->setTheta(new_theta);
00093 }
00094 
00100 void AssemblyMediator3D::RotateY(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00101 {
00102         float new_theta = theta_old + 720.0f*(event.getMouseEvent().GetX() - m_mouse_x)/window_w;
00103         doSnapRotate(new_theta);
00104         m_Assembly->setTheta(new_theta);
00105 }
00106 
00112 void AssemblyMediator3D::RotateXZ(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00113 {
00114         float new_phi = phi_old + 720.0f*(event.getMouseEvent().GetY() - m_mouse_y)/window_h;
00115         float new_rho = rho_old + 720.0f*(m_mouse_x - event.getMouseEvent().GetX())/window_w;
00116 
00117         doSnapRotate(new_phi);
00118         doSnapRotate(new_rho);
00119 
00120         m_Assembly->setPhi(new_phi);
00121         m_Assembly->setRho(new_rho);
00122 }
